reviews.review_msg: NOPE! not an open book exam, not a GPA booster. The professor is good he's pretty humble and a nice professor, but I couldn't follow or comprehend what he was saying most of the time. The exams are some what easy, but VERY "wordy" For the sake of your mentality, don't take it. BUT, if you're willing to make an effort ON YOUR OWN, you do you.

Very boring and disorganized lectures. Cancelled 3 of the lectures due to being sick. Was not active with checking email nor canvas. Was not helpful at all. Would never recommend this prof to anyone. Worst experience ive had at SFU.

One of the better lectures at SFU by far. you can get an A as long you do the work. Kinney makes his lectures interesting as well as relevant. Exams are fair, and if you have a serious legit issue- he'll take it into account. Does it get any better?
What is this guy doing here? Such a useless professor.  Thinks that crime can be understood using statistics.  Painful.
boring, dull, never gets to the point!
Moves around to much in class. Works very hard for his students
